<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1183</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using Multiple Intelligences to Teach Megillat Esther1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden der mehrfachen Intelligenzen, Megillat 
Esther1 zu unterrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation des intelligences multiples 
d'enseigner Megillat Esther1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando inteligências múltiplas ensinar Megillat
Esther1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando le intelligenze multiple insegnare 
Megillat Esther1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση πολλαπλάσιου Intelligences για να 
διδάξει Megillat Esther1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar inteligencias múltiples de enseñar 
Megillat Esther1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, learners analyze sections of chapter 2 of Megillat Esther in groups and then write a related skit, drama pantomime or illustrate a scene.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Megillat Esther</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interview</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">purim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bible story</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion analysieren Anfänger Kapitel 
von Kapitel 2 von Megillat Esther in den Gruppen und dann schreiben 
ein in Verbindung stehendes skit, Dramapantomime oder veranschaulichen
eine Szene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants analysent des 
sections du chapitre 2 de Megillat Esther dans les groupes et puis 
écrivent un skit relatif, pantomime de drame ou illustrent une 
scène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os learners analisam seções do 
capítulo 2 de Megillat Esther nos grupos e então escrevem um skit 
relacionado, pantomime do drama ou ilustram uma cena.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, i principianti analizzano le 
sezioni del capitolo 2 di Megillat Esther nei gruppi ed allora 
scrivono uno skit relativo, pantomime di dramma o illustrano una 
scena.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι αρχάριοι αναλύουν τα τμήματα 
του κεφαλαίου 2 Megillat Esther κατά ομάδες και γράφουν 
έπειτα σχετικό skit, την παντομίμα δράματος ή επεξηγούν μια 
σκηνή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los principiantes analizan 
secciones del capítulo 2 de Megillat Esther en grupos y entonces 
escriben un skit relacionado, pantomime del drama o ilustran una 
escena.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Megillat Esther</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interview</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">purim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibelgeschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Megillat Esther</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
